title: Rescue the Illithid's Captive
content:
Rescue the Illithid's Captive Type Quest Act Act 1 Location Nautiloid Reward __reward__

Rescue the Illithid's Captive

Rescue the Illithid's Captive is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Rescue the Illithid's Captive can be acquired during Act 1 and is a part of the prologue. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Rescue the Illithid's Captive Objectives
